description: Mountain town life is busy and the Bozeman Low Leather is ready to take on any and all of the fun and adventure that comes with it a lunch time hike on the Highland Glen Trail or any last-minute errands around town. The Bozeman Low Leather has classic mountain town good looks and a construction that provides all-day comfort and performance.
name: Oboz Bozeman Low Leather - Mens

specs.value: LWG gold certified PFC-free waterproof suede leather, Scratch Rubber Toe Cap + Heel Counter, 100% RPET Repreve Laces, 100% RPET Webbing, 83% RPET 17% Nanobon Trek-DRY Lining
Dual Density Compression Molded EVA, TPU Heel Clip
